body:
http://build.golang.org/log/730ad13c8e38c620324d13e5515cff7c412ca1c5 Failed again. There is some randomness. Could it be a GC related issue triggered by recent changes? 
fatal error: unexpected signal during runtime execution
[signal 0xb code=0x1 addr=0x14 pc=0x258e8]

+0x80

	/tmp/gobuilder/android-arm-crawshaw-4655aadd00fd/go/src/runtime/proc1.go:725

On Wed, Apr 22, 2015 at 8:08 PM Minux Ma wrote: > Something funny is happening here. > > My fix (CL 9246) to CL 9164 doesn't change any code of linux/arm at all, > but the builder is happy after that CL. > > Perhaps the culprit is not CL 9164? > > â€” > Reply to this email directly or view it on GitHub > . >
